pages.text: 86|1|Sapata akasara arau yi raatita atmaprakasa karae
86|2|arau kihe tomaka janaba ye, ‘raatita yiye atmaprakasa karae’ seya no ki
86|3|(seya haiche) ujjbala naksatra.
86|4|Pratyeka jirara oparate'i tattbabadhayaka ache.
86|5|Eteke manuhe cinta karaa ucita ye, taka kiherae srsti karaa haiche
86|6|taka srsti karaa haiche drautagatita nirgata horaa panirae
86|7|yito nirgata haya meraudanda arau bukura majara paraa.
86|8|Niscaya te'om taka ubhata'i anibalai saksama.
86|9|Yidina gopana bisayasamuha paraiksa karaa ha’ba
86|10|se'idina tara kono sakti nathakiba arau kono sahayakarai'o nathakiba.
86|11|Sapata akasara yiye barasuna dharana karae
86|12|sapata prthiraira, yito bidirna haya
86|13|niscaya e'ito (ala-kora'ana) mimansakarai bani.
86|14|Arau e'ito nirarthaka nahaya.
86|15|Niscaya sihamta bhisana sarayantra karae
86|16|arau mayo bhisana kausala karaicho.
86|17|Eteke kaphirasakalaka arakasa diya; sihamtaka kichu samayara babe arakasa diya.
87|1|Tumi tomara sumahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
87|2|yijane srsti karaiche, tara pichata suthama karaiche.
87|3|Arau yijane (bhagya) nirdharana karaiche tara pichata satpatha pradarsana karaiche
87|4|arau yijane trna-lata utpanna karaiche
87|5|tara pichata se'iboraka ka'la abarjanata parainata karaiche.
87|6|Anatipalame ami tomaka patha karaama, phalata tumi napaharaiba
87|7|kerala allahe yi bicarae tara bahirae. Niscaya te'om prakasya arau aprakasya sakalo jane.
87|8|Arau ami tomara babe sahaja patha sugama karai dima.
87|9|Eteke upadesa diya, yadi upadesa phalaprasu haya
87|10|upadesa siye'i grahana karaiba yiye bhaya karae.
87|11|Arau yi hatabhagya si iyaka agraahya karaiba
87|12|si bhayabaha ju'ita praraesa karaiba.
87|13|Tara pichata si tata mrtyubarano karaiba noraaraiba arau jiraita'o thakiba noraaraiba.
87|14|Niscaya saphalata labha karaiba yiye atmasud'dhi karaiba.
87|15|Arau tara pratipalakara nama smarana karaiba arau chalata adaya karaiba.
